name: Fanproject - A Doctor and A Garden
name_original: Fanproject - A Doctor and A Garden
description:
A fanproject based on A Hero and A Garden by NPCKC: 

https://npckc.itch.io/a-hero-and-a-garden

This story follows on after the events of A Hero and A Garden, with Cyrus having settled down into his job as gardener in the monster town. Yen has been trying to convey his feelings to Cyrus for some time, but nothing seems to work!
What can he do to get his feelings across? Why are things so difficult?
